question: Why is the British North America Act important in Canadian history?
possible_answers: A. It was agreed to by the First Nations and Inuit.
B. It was written by the British government.
C. The Aboriginal people signed the act.
main_question: Why is the British North America Act important in Canadian history?
explanatory_sentence: The British Parliament passed the British North America Act in 1867. The Dominion of Canada was officially born on July 1, 1867.
